[retrieving relevant log entry... ] [ -search query: "eclipse" ] [ -time recorded: t-minus 125,268 G-hr ] [ -log author: explorer ] [error: <Color=#ff0040>translation incomplete</Color> ]

"Alright. Log time. Nothing of note, just more empty space. Scientist says we'll <Color=#ff0040>;</Color>rrive at a new system n<Color=#ff0040>&</Color>xt cycle. Maybe we'll finally encounter another civilization. We haven't added anything to our transmission for the <Color=orange>Astral Codec</Color> in a while."

"Note: I hope the next body we dock at has a flammable atmosphere. It's been so long since our last cam<Color=#ff0040>+</Color>fire. Do you think the there will st<Color=#ff0040>[</Color>ll be campfires after? Surely there will. So many bodies have them, they're a consta<Color=#ff0040>/</Color>t of the universe."

"Archivist was talking again this cycle about needing to test the recipients' technology. It's the mo<Color=#ff0040>{</Color>t he's talked in a long time, kept going on about "the sun" and "spheres" and "a total eclipse"."

"It's strange how much he insists on this additional safeg<Color=#ff0040>.</Color>ard when he's usually so worried about any possible chance that the thread <Color=#ff0040>-</Color>e're starting might break."
